special_attacks: bardic performance 10 rounds/day (countersong, distraction, fascinate, inspire competence +2, inspire courage +1)
other_gear: masterwork dagger, bracers of armor +1, 48 gp

spells.bard spells known:
(CL 3rd; concentration +5)

1st (4/day)-charm person (DC 14),cure light wounds (DC 13), hypnotism (DC 14), sleep (DC 14)

0 (at will)-daze (DC 13), detect magic, light, lullaby (DC 13), mage hand, resistance

feats: Skill Focus (Bluff), Spell Focus (enchantment), Weapon Finesse

sections.body: During Combat The bard uses bardic performance to bolster his entourage, and spells to impede enemies.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Celebrity bards love the spotlight and their throngs of admiring fans.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Bard/Bards/Local Celebrity/Tremin Kaylos

sections.body: An up-and-coming local star, Tremin is the son of a crime boss. He uses his social clout to smear rivals.

sections.name: Tremin Kaylos

name: Local Celebrity
skills: Appraise +6, Bluff +11, Diplomacy +8, Disguise +8, Intimidate +6, Knowledge (arcana, nobility) +7, Knowledge (local) +9, Perception +4, Perform (act, dance) +8, Perform (sing) +7, Sense Motive +5, Spellcraft +8
will: +3; +4 vs. bardic performance, language-dependent, and sonic
